title: Bitcoin Faces Triple ‘Death Cross’ Warning Amid Historically Weak September
summary: In September, Bitcoin faces three "death crosses" on key indicators, signaling potential volatility. However, ETF stability and the Fed's rate cut decision co

body.raw:
![Bitcoin Faces Triple ‘Death Cross’ Warning Amid Historically Weak September](https://beincrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/BIC_LAYOFFS_NRGATIVE_CROSS.png)

In September, Bitcoin faces three "death crosses" on key indicators, signaling potential volatility. However, ETF stability and the Fed's rate cut decision could counteract bearish risks. Stay cautious and monitor market trends for potential shifts.

---

**Original Article:** [BeInCrypto](https://beincrypto.com/analysts-warn-of-3-bitcoin-death-crosses-september/)

*This article was originally published on [BeInCrypto](https://beincrypto.com/analysts-warn-of-3-bitcoin-death-crosses-september/) and has been curated for our readers.*
